text.80_Comment, 0_Paragraph: A woman cannot testify or serve as a judge. The convert requires three men at the time of accepting the commandments, but not at the time of immersion. Nevertheless, acceptance of the commandments only ideally requires three men, and similarly, the requirement of immersion during the day. The key term is 'Who does not.'"
text.109_Comment, 0_Paragraph: Rebecca was fourteen-years-old when she was married to Isaac. Isaac was 37-years-old when he was bound. D"H VCHEIN. Side b
